claims.claim: Education systems require teachers to undertake more responsibilities than is manageable.
claims.quote: Teachers are required to do too much

claims.claim: Understanding and addressing mental health issues from a young age is crucial.
claims.quote: I started to see how essential understanding of mental health was younger and younger

claims.claim: Experiential learning through travel can significantly benefit youth education.
claims.quote: you should read more, travel more

claims.claim: Youths benefit from mentoring on habits of successful individuals.
claims.quote: understand the habits of CEOs and develop

claims.claim: Mental health challenges are often mishandled or misunderstood by medical professionals.
claims.quote: my mother suffer from schizophrenia from 11 till she passed when I was 27

claims.claim: Communities lack open discussions and effective support systems for mental health issues.
claims.quote: it was nobody that I could say, 'Hey, I'm dealing with the worst trauma of my life over here'

claims.claim: The stigma associated with mental health issues prevents individuals from seeking help.
claims.quote: they were like me hiding behind the mask of that trauma

claims.claim: Youth enrichment programs should incorporate mental health support.
claims.quote: what I've built now with the educational service company is an opportunity to be able to share those experiences and make sure that youth...have outlets
